byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and ASHLEY PARKER

abstract: Donald J Trump delivers major foreign policy address, outlining his vision for country's future that includes major buildup of military, rapid dismantling of Islamic State and reassessment of international trade deals; speech, which is one of more formal ones Trump has given, draws criticism from across political spectrum.
lead_paragraph: “We’re going to finally have a coherent foreign policy, based on American interests and the shared interests of our allies,” Mr. Trump pledged.

headline.main: Donald Trump, Laying Out Foreign Policy, Promises Coherence
headline.print_headline: Trump Details Foreign Policy of Paradoxes

snippet: “We’re going to finally have a coherent foreign policy, based on American interests and the shared interests of our allies,” Mr. Trump pledged.
